events.name: Sweden and Finland's NATO membership bid
events.wd_label: Sweden and Finland's NATO membership bid
events.wd_description: Sweden and Finland's bid to join NATO requires unanimous agreement by all current members, but Turkey's President Erdogan opposes the move due to past sanctions and alleged support for the Kurdistan Workers' Party.
events.description: Sweden and Finland's bid to join NATO requires unanimous agreement by all current members, but Turkey's President Erdogan opposes the move due to past sanctions and alleged support for the Kurdistan Workers' Party.

events.name: Turkey's opposition
events.wd_description: President Recep Tayyip Erdogan opposed Sweden and Finland's bid to join NATO, citing sanctions placed on Turkey and their alleged support for the Kurdistan Workers' Party.
events.description: President Recep Tayyip Erdogan opposed Sweden and Finland's bid to join NATO, citing sanctions placed on Turkey and their alleged support for the Kurdistan Workers' Party.

events.name: Statements from Sweden and Finland
events.wd_description: The Finnish foreign minister stated that Finland would not negotiate with Turkey, while the Swedish Prime Minister emphasized NATO's role in strengthening Sweden in the new European reality.
events.description: The Finnish foreign minister stated that Finland would not negotiate with Turkey, while the Swedish Prime Minister emphasized NATO's role in strengthening Sweden in the new European reality.

events.name: China signs legal order for activities in disputed waters
events.wd_label: China signs legal order for activities in disputed waters
events.wd_description: President Xi of China signed a legal order allowing activities in disputed territorial waters, termed as "military activities other than war" by State Media.
events.description: President Xi of China signed a legal order allowing activities in disputed territorial waters, termed as "military activities other than war" by State Media.

events.name: China's claim to Taiwan Strait
events.wd_description: Chinese officials claimed sovereignty over the Taiwan Strait, accusing countries that see it as international waters of making false claims and threatening China's sovereignty.
events.description: Chinese officials claimed sovereignty over the Taiwan Strait, accusing countries that see it as international waters of making false claims and threatening China's sovereignty.

events.name: International navigation in Taiwan Strait
events.wd_description: Foreign nations have conducted freedom of navigation exercises in the Strait, sailing warships through the area and infuriating Beijing.
events.description: Foreign nations have conducted freedom of navigation exercises in the Strait, sailing warships through the area and infuriating Beijing.

events.name: US response to China's claim
events.wd_description: US State Department spokesperson Ned Price stated that the Strait is an international waterway with freedoms guaranteed by international law, and the US will continue to sail in accordance with international law.
events.description: US State Department spokesperson Ned Price stated that the Strait is an international waterway with freedoms guaranteed by international law, and the US will continue to sail in accordance with international law.

events.name: Ukraine's EU candidate status recommendation
events.wd_description: Ukraine's bid to join the European Union received a boost as the European Commission recommended the country for candidate status due to Russia's invasion.
events.description: Ukraine's bid to join the European Union received a boost as the European Commission recommended the country for candidate status due to Russia's invasion.

events.name: European Commission recommendation
events.wd_description: The European Commission President, Ursula von der Leyen, announced the recommendation for Ukraine to be given candidate status, contingent on further reforms.
events.description: The European Commission President, Ursula von der Leyen, announced the recommendation for Ukraine to be given candidate status, contingent on further reforms.

events.name: Moldova's candidate status
events.wd_description: The commission also recommended candidate status for Ukraine's neighbor, Moldova.
events.description: The commission also recommended candidate status for Ukraine's neighbor, Moldova.

events.name: Upcoming EU summit
events.wd_description: Leaders of the 27 EU member states are set to meet for a summit next week to discuss their options.
events.description: Leaders of the 27 EU member states are set to meet for a summit next week to discuss their options.

events.name: Zelensky's statement
events.wd_description: Volodymyr Zelensky stated at a press conference that Russia's attack on Ukraine amounted to an attack on all of Europe. The German Chancellor, French President, and Italian Prime Minister were present at the conference.
events.description: Volodymyr Zelensky stated at a press conference that Russia's attack on Ukraine amounted to an attack on all of Europe. The German Chancellor, French President, and Italian Prime Minister were present at the conference.

events.name: US EV Battery Supply Chain Development
events.wd_label: US EV Battery Supply Chain Development
events.wd_description: The U.S. faces challenges in competing in the global battery race for electric vehicles, with new initiatives to boost domestic battery production and supply chains.
events.description: The U.S. faces challenges in competing in the global battery race for electric vehicles, with new initiatives to boost domestic battery production and supply chains.

events.name: Infrastructure Bill Support
events.wd_description: The bipartisan infrastructure bill allocates $7.5 billion toward a national network of EV chargers and $3.16 billion to produce more batteries and components in the U.S.
events.description: The bipartisan infrastructure bill allocates $7.5 billion toward a national network of EV chargers and $3.16 billion to produce more batteries and components in the U.S.

events.name: t: EV Charger Network
events.wd_description: The infrastructure bill includes $7.5 billion for a national network of electric vehicle chargers.
events.description: The infrastructure bill includes $7.5 billion for a national network of electric vehicle chargers.

events.name: t: Battery Production Funding
events.wd_description: The DOE allocates $3.16 billion from the infrastructure bill to boost domestic battery production and related supply chains.
events.description: The DOE allocates $3.16 billion from the infrastructure bill to boost domestic battery production and related supply chains.

events.name: DOE Funding Allocation
events.wd_description: The DOE announces funding for new, retrofitted, and expanded battery plants, as well as battery recycling facilities.
events.description: The DOE announces funding for new, retrofitted, and expanded battery plants, as well as battery recycling facilities.

events.name: t: New Battery Plants
events.wd_description: Investment in the creation of new, retrofitted, and expanded battery plants.
events.description: Investment in the creation of new, retrofitted, and expanded battery plants.

events.name: t: Battery Recycling Facilities
events.wd_description: Investment in battery recycling facilities to support second-life applications for batteries.
events.description: Investment in battery recycling facilities to support second-life applications for batteries.

events.name: Competition with China
events.wd_description: The U.S. aims to reduce dependence on China for critical battery materials and boost its own battery production capabilities.
events.description: The U.S. aims to reduce dependence on China for critical battery materials and boost its own battery production capabilities.

events.name: t: Critical Minerals Strategy
events.wd_description: The U.S. focuses on securing reliable sources of critical materials like lithium, cobalt, nickel, and graphite.
events.description: The U.S. focuses on securing reliable sources of critical materials like lithium, cobalt, nickel, and graphite.

events.name: t: Domestic Mining Initiatives
events.wd_description: Efforts to develop domestic mining projects, such as Nevada’s Thacker Pass, to decrease reliance on imports.
events.description: Efforts to develop domestic mining projects, such as Nevada’s Thacker Pass, to decrease reliance on imports.

events.name: t: Battery Technology Advancements
events.wd_description: Advancements in battery technologies, including the shift towards chemistries that require less cobalt and nickel.
events.description: Advancements in battery technologies, including the shift towards chemistries that require less cobalt and nickel.
